A4.text: He played a leading part in English colonisation of North America.

A5.text: He participated in the siege of Smerwick.

A6.text: Poetry by Sir Walter Raleigh, plus commentary

A7.text: Walter Raleigh's 1584 expedition to the Atlantic coast of North America was supported by Queen Elizabeth I of England.

A8.text: The name 'Virginia' may have been suggested by Raleigh.
